message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $9500.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your generosity. I would like to counteroffer at $8500 for the product.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $9000.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in negotiating. I would like to counteroffer at $8750 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to work with you to find a mutually beneficial price. Considering your offer, I'm willing to reduce my price by a bit more. I'm now offering the product to you for $8800.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $8700 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still open to finding a deal. Considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you at the halfway point between our last offers. I'm now offering the product to you for $8550.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. I would like to counteroffer at $8600 for the product.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob! I'm still willing to work with you to find a deal. Considering your offer, I'm willing to reduce my price by a bit more. I'm now offering the product to you for $8500.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your efforts. I would like to counteroffer at $8450 for the product.
